lyric_text:
我的世界
奢糜浮华假像 没有那么多　
我的时间
只有你能为我停留
我的一切
没太多是与非　没有对与错
Oh no 地球因为你而转动
one girl one world
one heart beating
one love one moment
one vice singing
im creative making making it up as i go along
i can fake it no one but my lover will know
ill re-make it something that i never really thought about
oh no ! i cant seem to get enough of your love
one girl one world
one heart beating
one love one moment
one voice screaming
